title: Modern Love Podcast: With the Help of Strangers
summary:
Today, we hear about how Courtney has worked through the experience and aftermath of her abuse — and where is she now.
Today’s storiesCourtney’s essay ended with her walking “out of court into so much sunshine.” But as she explained to Daniel Jones in this podcast episode, the seven years since her essay was published have not been easy.
“I just want to get somewhere back to whatever my normal was,” she said.
One of the things that have helped her is her recent decision to become a court advocate.
Reflecting on the many people who have supported her, from lawyers to therapists, Courtney said, “I’ll never be able to adequately thank all of them for what they did for me.”“I’m a stranger to a lot of them,” she continued, “but what I can do is be that person to somebody else who needs a person.”
